alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Polk (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:51PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Floyd and western Polk Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Etna, or near Cedartown, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cedartown, Cave Spring, Etna and Esom Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
